name: R5-SubscriptionTopic-R4B-SubscriptionTopic
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 SubscriptionTopic into FHIR R4B

element.display: The definition of a specific topic for triggering events within the Subscriptions framework

target.display: The definition of a specific topic for triggering events within the Subscriptions framework
target.comment: R5 `SubscriptionTopic` maps as Equivalent to R4B `SubscriptionTopic`

element.display: When SubscriptionTopic is/was approved by publisher

target.display: When SubscriptionTopic is/was approved by publisher
target.comment: R5 `SubscriptionTopic.approvalDate` maps as Equivalent to R4B `SubscriptionTopic.approvalDate`

element.display: Properties by which a Subscription can filter notifications from the SubscriptionTopic

target.display: Properties by which a Subscription can filter notifications from the SubscriptionTopic
target.comment: R5 `SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy` maps as Equivalent to R4B `SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy`

element.display: eq | ne | gt | lt | ge | le | sa | eb | ap
Description of this filter parameter

target.display: Description of this filter parameter
target.comment: R5 `SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.description` maps as Equivalent to R4B `SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.description`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

target.display: Canonical URL for a filterParameter definition
target.comment: R5 `SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.filterDefinition` maps as Equivalent to R4B `SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.filterDefinition`

element.display: missing | exact | contains | not | text | in | not-in | below | above | type | identifier | of-type | code-text | text-advanced | iterate

target.display: = | eq | ne | gt | lt | ge | le | sa | eb | ap | above | below | in | not-in | of-type
target.comment: R5 `SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.modifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.modifier` - modifier has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/search-modifier-code|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/subscription-search-modifier|4.3.0 (Equivalent)
